snippet: Peter Spens, a London artist, worked on impressionistic scenes of the beach volleyball action at Horse Guards Parade for eight to 10 hours a day.
abstract: London artist Peter Spens works on impressionistic scenes of the beach volleyball action at the Olympic Games for eight to 10 hours a day.
lead_paragraph: Peter Spens, a London artist, worked on impressionistic scenes of the beach volleyball action at Horse Guards Parade for eight to 10 hours a day.

headline.seo: Painter Peter Spens Captures Beach Volleyball at the Olympics
